definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: You should each judge your own conduct.
sentences.chinese: 各人應當察驗自己的行爲。

sentences.english: This is when discernment is so important.
I know also, my God, that thou triest the heart, and hast pleasure in uprightness.
sentences.chinese: 我的神阿，我知道你察驗人心，喜悅正直。

sentences.english: I know, my God, that you test the heart and are pleased with integrity.
sentences.chinese: 我的神阿，我知道你察驗人心，喜悅正直。
